        menuBar.addmenuitem('Display Units', 'command',
                            'Display frame counts', label = 'Frame count',

        menuBar.addmenuitem('AnimPanel', 'command',

        menuBar.addmenuitem('AnimPanel', 'command',
                            'Set Actor controls to end time',
                            label = 'Jump all to end time',
                            command = self.resetAllToEnd)
